Title: Requires town and village justices be admitted to the practice of law
Summary: Requires town and village justices be admitted to the practice of law in this state and reside in the municipality in which the position is located; provides an exception to the requirement for currently serving justices; provides for the office of court administration to grant a waiver of the requirements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform justice court act, in relation to requiring town and village justices be admitted to the practice of law
